channel.title: Plz help me (skillcape)
channel.description: can anyone plz help me , with how do i add skillcape emotes on delta soucre ? i tryd so mutch i used sertch bar looking for more then 5 hours for an anwser , plz i want skillcape emotes like rs , greetz bountyleader

item.title: Plz help me (skillcape)
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

You can add animatioms to some extent

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help me (skillcape)
item.dc:creator: @Backlash Backlash
item.description:
@Backlash wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:8, topic:273358”][quote author=Backlash link=topic=361261.msg2747759#msg2747759 date=1239734725]

whats an enchanted client?

lol enchanted… you need to download a 508 server if you want exact runescape emotes, otherwise you gotta create your own

Good luck with that.

Your a whole lotta’ spam.

Power, if you want exact emotes, you will need what is called a 508. DeltaScape runs a 317, which has the basics. I suggest either Skittlesrulz 508 + client, or buttersdream 508. Both of these I have used before and highly recommend. If you do not want to use a different server, I know ProjectCzar has some custom Skillcape emotes.
[/quote]
Project Czar?[/quote]

Yea, one of the original sources had some customs. They also did not need a client, as they were bilt in Gfx and emoticons.

Read full topic
